00096 template<typename Type>
00097 Path<Type> Path<Type>::operator =(Path<Type> toEqual) {
00098     startTime = toEqual.startTime;
00099     endTime = toEqual.endTime;
00100     isCyclic = toEqual.isCyclic;
00101     isFinished = toEqual.isFinished;
00102 
00103     points.resize(toEqual.points.size());
00104     for (int i = 0; i < toEqual.points.size(); i++) {
00105         points[i] = toEqual.points[i];
00106     }
00107 
00108     return *this;
00109 }

00154 template<typename Type>
00155 void Path<Type>::makeCyclic() {
00156     isCyclic = true;
00157     if (isFinished) {
00158         isFinished = false;
00159     }

00190 template<typename Type>
00191 Type Path<Type>::getPoint(int time) {
00192     if (points.size() == 0) {
00193         return Type();
00194     }
00195 
00196     int timeRange = endTime - startTime;
00197     int timeLocation = 0;
00198 
00199     if (isCyclic) {
00200         timeLocation = (time - startTime) % timeRange;
00201     } else {
00202         timeLocation = (time - startTime);
00203     }
00204 
00205     double timeStep = (double)timeRange/(points.size() - 1*(!isCyclic));
00206 
00207     if (timeLocation < 0) {
00208         return Type();
00209     } else if (timeLocation > endTime) {
00210         printf("Changed the stated of isFinished\n");
00211         isFinished = true;
00212         return Type();
00213     } else {
00214         isFinished = false;
00215         double numSteps = (double)timeLocation / timeStep;
00216         int beforeIndex = floor(numSteps);
00217         int afterIndex = ceil(numSteps);
00218         if (afterIndex >= points.size()) {
00219             afterIndex = 0;
00220         }
00221         return points[beforeIndex] + (points[afterIndex] - points[beforeIndex])*(numSteps - beforeIndex);
00222     }
00223 }
